page.title: 07Transport
page.content: We looked at the reasons why people travel out of Marston.Shopping was the first.They went to Uttoxeter,Ashbourne,Derby and Sinfin. The second reason was for entainment.Apart from visiting local pubs and the village hall social club, people visited friends and to swimming clubs in Ashbourne and Uttoxeter.One of our samples went to concerts at the Abbotsholme Arts Society.For their exercise they went to Ashbourne,Uttoxeter and Rugeley swimming and some walked and cycled and did Aerobics at Uttoxeter and Hatton school.Those who work out of the village travel to Ashbourne,Derby,Uttoxeter and Hixon near Stafford.Most people we asked where people bought their last car.We decided "locally"meant any-where within 7 miles.
